====== DESCRIPTION ======

The word â€œNocturneâ€ conveys a dreamy, pensive composition or works of art dealing with the coming of darkness. We are seeking works that are evocative of the night, subjects as they appear in a veil of light, twilight or the absence of direct light. This theme lends itself to works that are tonal in nature, so works using soft, diffused light, muted tones and hazy outlined objects are welcome. We also invite artists to explore subjects associated with the night such as nocturnal animals and birds, people working the night shift, landscapes and cityscapes at night, and nocturnal fantasy creatures such witches, vampires and ghosts. And finally, artists whose favorite color is black are invited to submit works in that tone. Juror: Jennifer Perlmutter, Jennifer Perlmutter Gallery, LaFayette, CA


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Online submission only. Read prospectus and apply here: https://www.arc-sf.com
Email questions to arcgallerysf@gmail.com. If you would like to talk to us by phone, please include your phone number in your email.
